results.title: Acute ischemic optic neuropathy in a case of heroin overdose
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@Ischemic optic neuropathy@@@ has been reported in cases with @CHEMICAL_Methamphetamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008694 @@@methamphetamine@@@ use, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ overdose, and @CHEMICAL_Cocaine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003042 @@@cocaine@@@ use.

citations.NLM: Lakhani DA, Balar AB, Tarabishy AR, Hogg JP, Khan M. Acute ischemic optic neuropathy in a case of heroin overdose Radiol Case Rep. 2022 Oct;17(10):3950-3954. PMID: 36032202
citations.BibTeX: @article{36032202, title={Acute ischemic optic neuropathy in a case of heroin overdose}, author={Lakhani DA and Balar AB and Tarabishy AR and Hogg JP and Khan M}, journal={Radiol Case Rep}, volume={17}, number={10}, pages={3950-3954}}

results.title: Bilateral blindness secondary to optic nerve ischemia from severe amlodipine overdose: a case report
results.text_hl: Bilateral @DISEASE_Blindness @DISEASE_MESH:D001766 @@@blindness@@@ secondary to @<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@optic nerve ischemia@@@ from severe @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ overdose: a case report

citations.NLM: Kao R, Landry Y, Chick G, Leung A. Bilateral blindness secondary to optic nerve ischemia from severe amlodipine overdose: a case report J Med Case Rep. 2017 Aug 3;11(1):211. PMID: 28768527

results.title: Effect of metoprolol and amlodipine on myocardial total ischaemic burden in patients with stable angina pectoris.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@Metoprolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ reduced the total duration of @<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ episodes from 86.0 min to 15-1 and 48.3 min with a mean episode duration of 1.1 and 2.6 min, respectively.

citations.NLM: Klein G, Pfafferott C, Beil S, Gehring J, Niemelä M, Kendall MJ. Effect of metoprolol and amlodipine on myocardial total ischaemic burden in patients with stable angina pectoris. J Clin Pharm Ther. 1997 Oct-Dec;22(5-6):371-8. PMID: 19160722
citations.BibTeX: @article{19160722, title={Effect of metoprolol and amlodipine on myocardial total ischaemic burden in patients with stable angina pectoris.}, author={Klein G and Pfafferott C and Beil S and Gehring J and Niemelä M and Kendall MJ}, journal={J Clin Pharm Ther}, volume={22}, number={5-6}, pages={371-8}}

results.title: Transdermal application of azithromycin-amlodipine-heparin gel enhances survival of infected random ischaemic flap.
results.text_hl: In the in vivo @<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ flaps, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@AB@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Heparin_Low_Molecular_Weight @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006495 @@@LMWH@@@ increased the blood supply.

citations.NLM: Qin YH, Jiao HS, Li AS, Jiao Y, Wei LM, Zhang J, Zhong L, Liu K, Zhang XF. Transdermal application of azithromycin-amlodipine-heparin gel enhances survival of infected random ischaemic flap. J Plast Surg Hand Surg. 2015;49(6):319-26. PMID: 26083309

results.title: Anti-ischaemic properties of amlodipine, a new calcium antagonist, in patients with severe coronary artery disease: a prospective trial.
results.text_hl: Anti-@<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ properties of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, a new calcium antagonist, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with severe @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@: a prospective trial.

citations.NLM: Navarro Estrada J, Saglietti H, Dimarco M, Casabé H, Oliveri R. Anti-ischaemic properties of amlodipine, a new calcium antagonist, in patients with severe coronary artery disease: a prospective trial. Postgrad Med J. 1991;67 Suppl 5():S52-3. PMID: 1839441

results.title: Vascular and myocardial effects of amlodipine: an overview.
results.text_hl: When administered intravenously (0.25 mg/kg) 5 h before hearts were excised and made globally @<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ for short periods (the '@DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@stunned@@@' heart) @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ pretreatment improved functional recovery associated with reperfusion.

citations.NLM: Nayler WG, Gu XH. Vascular and myocardial effects of amlodipine: an overview. Postgrad Med J. 1991;67 Suppl 5():S41-3. PMID: 1839439
citations.BibTeX: @article{1839439, title={Vascular and myocardial effects of amlodipine: an overview.}, author={Nayler WG and Gu XH}, journal={Postgrad Med J}, volume={67 Suppl 5}, pages={S41-3}}

results.title: The efficacy of amlodipine in the management of ischaemic heart disease.
results.text_hl: Exercise testing carried out 24 hours post dose has confirmed that once-daily doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ provide good anti-anginal and anti-@<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ efficacy for a full 24 hours, a vital aspect of any therapy for @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@ischaemic heart disease@@@.

citations.NLM: McGibney D. The efficacy of amlodipine in the management of ischaemic heart disease. Postgrad Med J. 1991;67 Suppl 3():S24-8. PMID: 1836871
citations.BibTeX: @article{1836871, title={The efficacy of amlodipine in the management of ischaemic heart disease.}, author={McGibney D}, journal={Postgrad Med J}, volume={67 Suppl 3}, pages={S24-8}}

results.title: Amlodipine in patients with stable angina pectoris treated with beta-blockers. Double-blind comparison with placebo.
results.text_hl: In order to assess additional anti-@<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@AML@@@) on @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@) treated with beta-blockers, 32 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@, verified on angiograms, and @DISEASE_Angina_Stable @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina@@@ were randomized to receive 5 mg/day of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@AML@@@ or placebo, increasing to 10 mg/day after 2 weeks.

citations.NLM: Rossinen J, Partanen J, Nieminen MS. Amlodipine in patients with stable angina pectoris treated with beta-blockers. Double-blind comparison with placebo. Scand Cardiovasc J. 1998;32(1):41-8. PMID: 9536505

results.title: A double-blind dose-response study of amlodipine in patients with stable angina pectoris.
results.text_hl: The mechanisms underlying the anti-@<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ are still under discussion.
